name: Poocha-Ser
description: Poocha-Ser -a Whatsapp userbot helping to improve your Whatsapp experience

ASENA_SESSION.description: Qr.Js ile oluşturduğunuz özel session kodu. Type here yours Asena Session.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. English => en,  Malayalam => ml, Indonesia => ID

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_VIDEO.description: If you likes video you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

SAID_NUMBER.description: use your orginal phone number ex 918606759500

ANTİ_LİNK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

AUTO_BİO.description: Duruma otomatik tarih ve zaman eklemek için true yapın. Set true for auto date, time in biography.

Z_WHITE_AI.description: turn on chat back auto reply WHITE (use true to on and fale to off)

Z_BOT_NAME.description: give a name you disire to give your bot (for auto reply white to identify)

Z_DEP_NAME.description: bot deployer name make it short  (for auto reply white to identify)

Z_BOT_REPLY.description: enter the repply message you want when deployer name is typed by users  (for auto reply white to identify)
Z_BOT_REPLY.value: i know him he is my creator

ALL_LINK_BAN.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks all link

NO_LOG.description: Hata logu görmek istemiyorsanız true yapın. Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Görüldü atmak istiyorsanız true yazın. Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: Herokuda çalışıyorsa true yazın. If it is running in Heroku, type true.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Herokuda API Keyiniz. Heroku API Key.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Mute Mesajı. Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.
MUTE_MESSAGE.value: **BOT POOCHA SER _HAD CHANGE THIS GROUP TO ALLOW ONLY ADMINS CAN SEND MESSAGE_* _HAD CHANGE THIS GROUP TO ALLOW ONLY ADMINS CAN SEND MESSAGE_*

THERI_LIST.description: bad word ban...  add the bad words you dont allow in your grp (THERI_KICK must be true to run this feature , and dont change the 1st word ) example: plk-dqz,f**k,d**k
bad word ban...  add the bad words you dont allow in your grp (THERI_KICK must be true to run this feature) example: plk-dqz,f**k,d**k

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Unmute Mesajı. Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.
UNMUTE_MESSAGE.value: *BOT POOCHA SER _HAD CHANGE THIS GROUP TO ALLOW ALL CAN SEND MESSAGE TO THIS GROUP_*

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Block Mesajı. Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.
BLOCK_MESSAGE.value: ```You Are Added To The Blacklist For 1-DAY```

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Unblock Mesajı. Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: WhiteDevil Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.and if you use “admin”, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Herokuda uygulama adı. Heroku APP Name.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.
ALIVE_MESSAGE.value:
*HELLO, I'M WHITE DEVIL BOT USED FOR ENTERTAINMENT PURPOSE* 

 ```നീ ഏതാ..... ഒന്ന് പോടെയ് അവൻ ജീവൻ ഉണ്ടോ ചോയ്ച്ച് വന്നിരിക്കുന്നു😤...I'm Different Bot U Know```*Ok, ഇനി ചോദിക്കരുത്* 
 *[!help]*  *[!menu]* *[!list]*  *ടൈപ്പ് ചെയ്താൽ മതി commands അറിയാൻ*

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

CHANGE_BGM_TO.description: Dont leave this blank choose the bgm you need - enter one or two

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.
AFK_MESSAGE.value:
*_എന്റെ ബോസ്സ് ഇപ്പൊൾ ഓൺലൈനിൽ ഇല്ല._* 

 *കാരണം*: ```ON WORK(ഇപ്പോൾ പണിയിലാ)😉```

GAN_IMAGE.description: Gan Style eklentisi için resim bağlantısı yazın. Type image link for Gan Style plugin.

TAG_REPLY.description: Enter jid of your number so that you get a audio reply when metioned example - 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

BOT_PRESENCE.description: Type the Presence of bot, presences: online => Always Shows the online, offline => Always Shows offline, typing => Always Shows typing, recording => Always Shows recording.. NOTE : THE PRESENCE WILL BE PERMANENT, UNTIL THE BOT IS ALIVE / RUNNING / WORKING

COFFEEHOUSE_API_KEY.description: Pass This Step! - Bu Bölümü Geçin!
